name: Tanyard Creek Park
description: Tanyard Creek Park is a part of a group of parks that sit on the North Beltline trail. The park has a large open greenspace perfect for dogs and picnics as well as a playground on the west side of the creek. Walking south along the beltline will take you to Tanyard Creek Urban Forest and Ardmore Park.
parking: There is a small parking lot off Collier Rd at the north end of the park. Iâ€™ve also seen cars parked on Overbrook Dr.
